resources.string: Want to show you astronomy picture of the day â€“ %s: https://apod.nasa.gov/apod/ap%s.html
Picture cannot be downloaded as you denied storage permission
To be able to download pictures you must give storage permission on the next dialog as all downloaded pictures go to storage. APOD will never touch any other files in storage.
You denied storage permission, so now pictures cannot be downloaded. If you want to download picture need to go to settings and allow storage permission manually.
